version_description: This update is full of big changes you should never see. We worked hard to make the app faster, lighter, and more stable than ever. Update and try for yourself!

This new Audiomack drop is positively massive. Plus, we can now say, vous pouvez maintenant utiliser Audiomack en français!

That's right – the app is now available in French. Just switch your phone's language to French in settings and enjoy.
Plenty of exciting under-the-hood improvements in this update, plus bug fixes and performance improvements.
Under-the-hood adjustments and lots of bug fixes.

Looking for something? We've just totally overhauled search to make it easier than ever to find your favorite music, playlists, and artists. Hop on now and search "Verified Hip Hop", "Hometown Heroes: Hong Kong", Nicki Minaj, and start listening!
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Get ready for a big one: Audiomack is now fully available in Spanish! Go to your phone's settings and set Spanish as your default to translate the app.
As if that isn't big enough news: Highlight any song, album, or playlist on your profile to show off
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This latest Audiomack release is fire. You could say it’s smoking. We’ve planted new features, weeded out bugs, and some secret new projects are growing under the surface. This update includes:

This new Audiomack drop is positively massive. Plus, we can now say, vous pouvez maintenant utiliser Audiomack en français!

That's right – the app is now available in French. Just switch your phone's language to French in settings and enjoy.

We need to talk about something big: Audiomack has comments now! Tap any song, album, or playlist and join the conversation. Be nice.
